page.title: 12Mr.Roberts-The beef farmer.
page.content: On Mr.Roberts'farm there are a hundred stores and twelve Highland cattle,some sheep and lambs.He has been living at Limes Farm for twelve years and enjoys his job.He has Hereford cross Friesian cows,mules,Masham sheep and some rams which are mostly Suffolk.Mr.Roberts'job consists of looking after all the animals and making sure they are all well.He keeps the cattle for about eighteen months and then takes them to the butchers.It takes him about three hours to feed the animals in the winter and ten minutes in the summer.It takes about three minutes to shear a sheep,but he is not concerned with that,although he has been a shepherd for 23 years.The cattle are fed on silage in the winter,also rolled barley.Of all the animals on the farm,Mr.Roberts prefers the cattle.
